OnHelpText: Is microphone playback on/off after launch? (default true)
BufferMillisecondsHelpText: Captures audio in given chunk lengths (default 50 (ms))
NumberOfBuffersHelpText: How many chunks of audio will overlap? (default 10)
DiscardOnBufferOverflowHelpText: If buffer overflows, it will be deleted (default true)
DesiredLatencyHelpText: Latency between audio capture and playback (default 100 (ms))
EmptyCacheSecondsHelpText: How frequently is cache be emptied while program is running (default 100 (s))
LowPassFrequencyHelpText: (Low pass filter) Noices above this frequncy will be cut off (default 800(hz))
HighPassFrequencyHelpText: (High-pass filter) Noices below this frequncy will be cut off (default 500(hz))
!NOTICE!: Be aware that too high quality factor may cause damage for user's headphones or ears!
LowPassQualityFactorHelpText: (Low pass filter) Width of transition between passband and stopband (default 1)
HighPassQualityFactorHelpText: (High-pass filter) Width of transition between passband and stopband (default 1)
